channel.title: Registering Server Error
channel.description:
[center][b]Finally answering all those questions....[/b][/center] [b]Assumed Knowledge: Reading, and typing. Difficulty:1/10[/b] ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ If you get this while uploading your server...
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ' IP` = 'peacescape.no-ip.biz' OR `ipfield` = '12.201.25.223'' at line 1
Then on the second line, you just put these in: 'yourservername.no-ip.org' [img]http://i247.photobucket.com/albums/gg146/Fantasykik/yeppers.jpg[/img]

item.title: Registering Server Error
item.dc:creator: @Ruppich Ruppich
item.description:
@Ruppich wrote:

[center]Finally answering all those questions…[/center]

Assumed Knowledge: Reading, and typing.
Difficulty:1/10

If you get this while uploading your server…

You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ' IP` = 'peacescape.no-ip.biz' OR `ipfield` = '12.201.25.223'' at line 1

Then on the second line, you just put these in: ‘yourservername.no-ip.org’

Read full topic
